data.title: Arthur Wagner
data.meta_description: Arthur Wagner is the father of William Wagner and husband of Jean Campbell Wagner. While overseas, Arthur sent his best friend, Marco's father, into a hot zone in Iraq, causing him to be killed. He then married Jean, Will and Marco's mother. Arthur Wagner does not directly appear in the film...
data.text:
Arthur Wagner is the father of William Wagner and husband of Jean Campbell Wagner.

While overseas, Arthur sent his best friend, Marco's father, into a hot zone in Iraq, causing him to be killed. He then married Jean, Will and Marco's mother.

Notes[]
